alert.note: Alert for Northern Fairfield; Northern New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 12:53AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL FAIRFIELD AND NORTHWESTERN NEW HAVEN COUNTIES THROUGH 145 AM EDT... At 1253 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bethel, or near Danbury, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Waterbury, Danbury, Naugatuck, Southbury, Wolcott, Newtown, Cheshire, Ridgefield, Monroe, Bethel, Wilton, Brookfield, New Fairfield, Weston, and Prospect. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
